title: AC conductivity study of mechanochemically synthesized solid electrolytes of Li6−aMa/nnPS5Cl (M = Ca, Mg, Ba, Zn, Al, Y)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16240-16247
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02621G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tran Viet Toan, Luu Tuan Anh, Nguyen Thi Minh Nguyet, Tran Anh Tu, Nguyen Huu Huy Phuc
Argyrodite-type solid electrolytes of Li6PS5Cl doped with multivalent cations (Mg2+, Ba2+, Zn2+, Al3+, Y3+) were prepared via a mechanochemical synthesis method.
